name: Rock Shark Diamonds
description:
Throw Rocks, Evade Sharks and Collect Diamonds while going deeper and deeper in this retro diving adventure! 

P.S. Don't run out of Oxygen!

Controls and Instructions:

  • WASD to Swim
  • Mouse Click to Drop Rock
  • Swimming uses more oxygen than sinking

Made in 72 Hrs for LudumDare48 

Credits for BGM:
